inputs.remark: V2 缺少助听器验配内容。

logic_summary: Added 'Hearing aid fitting' to the ordered list of investigations.
Inserted a new visit (V2) to capture the hearing aid fitting event described in the text ('SR was fitted bilaterally...').
Renumbered the subsequent visits: the routine check becomes V3, and the foreign body discovery becomes V4.

value.rationale_short: Fit amplification to address hearing loss.

value.collective_interpretation: SR was fitted bilaterally with digitally programmable receiver-in-the-ear (RITE) instruments that used no. 312 batteries. The fitting required more counseling than usual due to the patient's reduced understanding of use and care.

tests.name: Hearing aid fitting
tests.result_summary: Bilateral RITE instruments fitted. Patient required extensive counseling on use and care.
